display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
display_long_description_unprocessed:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=ZZdRg2Vg_LQQ7kNvwHYAYnp&_nc_oc=AdmwPk5DxXM-kEDLq1SDmrGPk5TtAcP8nUrjm7VDZ_NhlCyQmzgRePxyxu5QzyK0e9A&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=D2So3NFac1XgovTFeub4CQ&oh=00_AfJRaU8EcI1_U0iYib6066yqs4N-f5MYGYNsBoPZkFBmVw&oe=6836DCDD)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=jvY_Q5p7BacQ7kNvwHvq3EG&_nc_oc=AdmrKvQtmfQXr_wZCeuEGv4OE0vSamdb8HIaIjvKcMFY-Zg0ui3rPMCkQXsEz3xUqDI&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=D2So3NFac1XgovTFeub4CQ&oh=00_AfLUPIvmvyJWIJustSpP1V5hue2KUYURyQpc5fkV_QVq-g&oe=6836F6D2)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=imWm8XWtXyAQ7kNvwFshdTG&_nc_oc=AdlWjcV0Ecxdw09H1qfm2VfjvB1k383Mmk9qP-voWaadC7gf_T4VhvugKp1WgOwfbso&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=D2So3NFac1XgovTFeub4CQ&oh=00_AfJ_ojxlgFFbIEDdPKrSVjiv5RE3AToUKx0h6O9JuBzm2A&oe=6836FCE3)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=-yvrKd8ovo8Q7kNvwHjP1rI&_nc_oc=AdkFbiTNSIykyETglXurS6jDvzKg6EBOnz4gG41HvS7t1FHWXmBADB0v6X6augQ8IbM&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=D2So3NFac1XgovTFeub4CQ&oh=00_AfIZSTr2nyF_fNJyjCsEwshshS4fzf87fKPeMNxd8AuK2A&oe=6836F36E)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=gbGAUa5wQPIQ7kNvwE_wC6M&_nc_oc=Adm27zfB5XpAmWnb0JGIzXvXaiYjhEjSr8E2e1uBPJbTVCnNZjHMLN_zWaZwdhHo0Lo&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=D2So3NFac1XgovTFeub4CQ&oh=00_AfIbVs2wOPA38LJbMsfZAZuKuAoTJMvZyAdncqOwPphLmA&oe=6836FB56)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
